Respect?  Please.  The hackers don't do it so that you defend them.  They don't give a fuck if any of us get the release or not.  When you mount the game anyway, their trademark is all over it anway.

Relax guys.  If you crush the poul souls who upload games, eventually *noone* will upload -- and all you'll have to do is play with yourself with all your newfound time. :P
